steps.action: Clone the ace3p-extensions repository, either or .
steps.title: Clone ace3p-extensions repository

steps.expect: modelbuilder to open a directory browser dialog
steps.title: New project

steps.action: In that dialog, navigate to the test directory you created in the setup procedure and create a subdirectory `omega3p-test1`. Select the new subdirectory and click the `OK`.
steps.expect: modelbuilder to display a "Specify New Project" dialog with the "Workspace Directory" and "Name (Subdirectory)" fields set.
steps.title: New project directory

steps.action: Set the "Simulation Template File" to the ACE3P template that is in the ace3p-extensions repository at `simulation-workflows/ACE3P.sbt`.
steps.title: Simulation template "ACE3P.sbt"

steps.expect: modelbuilder to close the dialog, then display the model geometry in the 3D view and update the Attribute Editor to display a "Modules" tab. On some systems, the model is not immediately displayed, but instead it appears when the "Resources" tab is selected. If that occurs, add a comment to the GitLab issue. Verify that there are two items listed in the "Resources" panel, labeled `sbi.default` and `pillbox4`.
steps.title: Apply

steps.action: In the "Attribute Editor" panel, select the "Omega3P" option in the "Modules" tab.
steps.expect: modelbuilder to display 3 additional tabs "Boundary Conditions", "Materials", and "Analysis".
steps.title: Set Omega3P module

steps.action:
In the "Boundary Conditions" panel:
  1. Set "Unnamed set ID: 1" to "Magnetic".
  2. Set "Unnamed set ID: 2" to "Magnetic".
  3. Set "Unnamed set ID: 6" to "Exterior".
steps.title: Set Boundary Conditions

steps.action: In the "Analysis" tab, set "Number of eigenmodes searched" to 3.
steps.expect: background color of that field to change from yellow to white.
steps.title: Set Analysis options

steps.action: Click the Project => Project Save menu item.
steps.expect: modelbuilder to display "Saved project" in the "Output Messages" panel.
steps.title: Save Project

steps.action: Select the Project => Export Project menu item.
steps.expect: modelbuilder to open a "Simulation Export Dialog" with every field set and the "Apply" button enabled.
steps.title: Begin Export Project

steps.expect:
modelbuilder to close the dialog and write a few lines to the "Output Messages" panel, the last one 
Number of warnings: 0
.
steps.title: Apply Export

steps.action: Verify that a short text file was created in a project subdirectory `omega3p-test1/export` with an extension `omega3p`.
steps.title: Verify Result

steps.action: Select the Project => Close Project menu item.
steps.expect: modelbuilder to clear both tabs ("Attribute Editor", "Resources") and the 3D display.
steps.title: Close Project

steps.action: Add note to GitLab issue that test was completed.
steps.title: Report
